item.title: The failure of modern day democracy
item.description: In this note i want to explore the thought that modern day democracy has failed. I think modern day democracy doesn’t have a future. I will explain why and propose a new form of government that i think is the better option. Why democracy doesn’t work in its current form Link to heading Most western countries have a democracy as government. The people choose who they want to represent them. This sounds good in practice, because if a lot of people vote who they want, the government will do anything that’s in the best interest of the people right?
